name: Unicorn Makeout Mania
description:
The distant future. 1986. A deadly underground bloodsport sweeps the world becoming the most popular violent entertainment sport. UNICORN MAKEOUT MANIA!!!! Challenge your friends in versus mode or duke it out yourself in a tournament. Bonus challenge.. play with your feet!

Controls:

Keyboard (No gamepad connected)

Player 1 - D-Pad + M , . / (M = Select)

Player 2 - WADS + C V B N (C = Select + Join Game in Player Menu)

PC download Supports compatible Gamepads + Keyboard input editing in the drop down menu under Players
